Description of incident: Bay Area Children's Network notified individuals of a data breach, when an unauthorized person (s) accessed their patient account records. The patient information acquired was due to the result of malware installed sometime in January 2015.The information compromised included names, addresses, telephone numbers, dates of birth, Social Security numbers, medical inurance and health visit information. More Information: http://oag.ca.gov/ecrime/databreach/reports/sb24-61688
